name: Saucer of a cup and saucer
description: Saucer of a cup and saucer; Etienne-Henri Le Guay (French, 1719/1720 - about 1799), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1765 - 1770; Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding; 3.2 × 7 cm (1 1/4 × 2 3/4 in.); 89.DE.25.3.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Saucer of a cup and saucer
medium: Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding
